rebalancing-arb.name: Rebalancing Arbitrage
rebalancing-arb.notes: Scanned 1000+ markets. No viable arbs at $433 scale. Tail outcomes illiquid. Revisit at $5K+.

pipeline.notes: v2 mandates at least 1 new strategy entering pipeline every Monday
